name: FERAL (Games Academy)
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Feral is a turn-based strategy-title for 2 players in which the Reptilia and

the Mammalia fight each other with a diversity of unit-types and buildings

in order to gather crystal energy and destroy the enemy´s headquarter.

Specifications

Plattform                      PC

Technologies               Unity

Genre                              Turn-Based Strategy

Controls                         Mouse & Keyboard

Setting                           Sci-Fantasy

Target Group              Fans of Strategy & Tabletop

References                   Into the Breach, Advance Wars,

                                            Endless Legend & Age of Wonders
